name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens have discovered that Hu Xijin's multiple social media accounts have not been updated since the 27th. There are rumors on Weibo that Hu Xijin has been banned.
At the same time, Hu Xijin's article interpreting the Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee was deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
One more thing to add
Currently, many Weibo bloggers regard the blocking of Hu Xijin’s topic as evidence
But in fact, Hu Xijin’s topic was already blocked last year

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 29, Venezuela. After President Nicolas Maduro won the election, he was questioned about electoral fraud, which triggered a large number of people in the country to take to the streets to protest. They shouted "It's going to fall" and marched to the city center, burning Maduro's propaganda portraits and toppling Hugo Chavez's statues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Around 5 p.m. local time, Chavista paramilitaries opened fire on protesters in downtown Caracas.
But some protesters did not back down, using steel plates and cars as cover and continuing to advance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Coro, Falcon State, people burned a National Guard VN-4 bomb-proof vehicle

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Protesters on the Pan-American Highway in Carrizal

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Photo of the Day: Smash That Dictator

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People used vehicles as cover to avoid bullets and moved forward

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, Venezuela announced the severance of diplomatic relations with Argentina, Chile, Costa Rica, Peru, Panama, the Dominican Republic and Uruguay.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Earlier, China congratulated Maduro on his re-election

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Thousands continue to tear down statues of Chavez

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A militiaman fired at people with a semi-automatic weapon

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People shot

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A group of protesters occupied the road outside the Simon Bolivar International Airport in the capital

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A group of people beat up a lone policeman and stole his motorcycle. His teammates ignored him and fled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A group of National Guard troops joined the protesters in the march

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police fired and retreated, and one of the officers who was alone was attacked by the protesters who chased after him. His teammates also ignored him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Around 6 p.m., smoke rose in Caracas, the capital of Venezuela.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At 7 p.m., a large number of military and police were stationed outside the Argentine embassy and consulate in Venezuela.
Earlier today, the Argentine government condemned Maduro's election fraud, after which Venezuela announced the severance of diplomatic relations with Argentina.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was added that the reason Venezuelan military and police surrounded the Argentine embassy and consulate was because opposition leaders Maria Corina Machado and Edmundo González were currently inside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Opposition leader Maria Corina Machado said at a press conference that they confirmed they had won the election after counting 73.2% of the votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 7:26 p.m. People in Caracas sing the national anthem and beat drums in support of the protesters

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A large number of people came to the Argentine embassy and consulate to show their support

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Opposition leaders were encouraged by the crowds of people who showed up outside the embassy to show their support.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Venezuelan media EVTV said opposition candidate Edmundo Gonzalez received 6,275,182 votes, while Maduro received 2,759,256 votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At night, Venezuelans toppled statues of dictator Chavez one after another

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another statue of dictator Chavez toppled

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some polling stations began announcing their own vote counts due to distrust of the National Electoral Council. In this polling station, Maduro received 158 votes and Edmundo González received 966 votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Venezuelans drag head and body of dictator Chavez statue in parade

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Argentina's foreign minister expressed gratitude to the Venezuelan people who gathered outside the embassy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some police officers refused to suppress the people and took off their uniforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, on the streets of Caracas

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Residents tear down a huge portrait of Chavez from the wall of the government office in La Guaira

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Barcelona, Anzoátegui, the National Guard and the State Police give up their crackdown and hand over weapons and shields to demonstrators

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People burned huge propaganda banners of Maduro.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 28, Luzhou, Sichuan. A woman posted a video saying that her mother is almost 80 years old. The social security is only 135 yuan per month, and it is getting less and less every year.
"My mother is almost 80 years old and has no minimum living allowance. Many of her children have medical insurance, but why doesn't my mother have a minimum living allowance?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Changsha, Hunan. Homeowners of Best Cloud Community complained that the building was shoddy, with mold, cracks, and water leaks appearing in the community after just a few days of rain. On the 21st, the sales office even closed the door to prevent the owners from entering to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Water conditions in Mentougou, Beijing on July 30.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 29, in Qinzhou, Guangxi, several security guards in Tianhe Mansion beat up a food delivery man. An informed owner said: The property management prohibited food delivery vehicles from entering, and the food delivery man was taken away by an ambulance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Protesters burn down Kalilubana mayor's office

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Protesters throw Molotov cocktails at military vehicles

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Military police watched as people toppled Maduro's portrait

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of July 30, the Japanese team has won 6 gold medals, ranking first, which has caused Chinese netizens to be overwhelmed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another dictator statue toppled by the people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning, some protesters returned goods to looted stores. 
"We don't want thieves among us, we want freedom," they said.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Liberty Leading the People

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Breaking news! On July 30, Xinhua County, Loudi, Hunan Province, someone hung a Sitong Bridge slogan on the overpass and played loudly on a speaker, "We want freedom, we want democracy, we want votes! Strike and remove the dictator Xi Jinping."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Another A-share company announced: reducing executive compensation! 
After the chairman of Shanzi Hi-Tech, whose stock price fell below 1 yuan, voluntarily stopped taking his salary, Haixin Energy, which has been losing money in recent years, announced on July 29 that it would significantly reduce the compensation of its executives.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 29, at Jiangmen Municipal Government Service Center, a staff member held up a sign to protest: We have been owed wages for four months and we refuse to delay the payment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 30, after it was reported online that Hu Xijin was suspected of being banned from speaking for interpreting the Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee, the People's Daily published an article: Adhere to and implement the "two unshakable" principles. 
The article emphasized that as long as the leadership of the Communist Party of China is upheld, as long as public ownership is upheld as the main body, and multiple ownership economies develop together, the superiority of the socialist system will not only not be weakened, but will continue to increase, and the foundation of our party's governance will not only not be shaken, but will become more stable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, Xi Jinping called to congratulate Maduro on his election as President of Venezuela.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 29, the Supreme People's Procuratorate reported that in the first half of the year, 367,000 criminal suspects were arrested and 761,000 were prosecuted, up 18.5% and 6.8% year-on-year respectively.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xi Jinping pointed out that China will firmly support Venezuela's just cause in opposing external interference.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 29, Shaoxing, Zhejiang. Two men clashed on the street, with one man holding a machete and looking aggressive.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It hurts so much that it makes you scream! Zhou Hongyi tries out the anti-pinch feature on the Aion car door but gets his hand pinched
July 30 (Released) 360 Chairman Zhou Hongyi tries out the Haobo model under GAC Aion. The car company staff said that the scissor door of the model has an anti-pinch feature, but Zhou Hongyi got his hand pinched during the experience.
The video shows that when the scissor door of the car was opened, Zhou Hongyi asked the staff: "Will it pinch my hand?" The staff said that there is an anti-pinch feature and he can try it.
After Zhou Hongyi put his hand in, the scissor door did not recognize it and closed directly. Zhou Hongyi screamed after his hand was pinched. The staff immediately apologized, saying, "Sorry, I should have tried it first."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another dictator statue toppled

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the content of the campus recruitment training of Muyuan shares has been circulated online. According to the campus recruitment, they are required to undergo military management, have their hair cut, and have their cell phones taken away, just like in the recruit camp. Some employees also added that they have to wear military uniforms and train until after 10:30 p.m. every day, and even have to recite the entire text of the Pig Worship Text.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, according to videos shot by Hong Kong residents and tourists, rows of shops along the street have closed or transferred, showing a state of depression. A local resident said, "The catering industry is the hardest hit, and there are many traditional old shops among them." In response, netizens replied, "Taiwanese people should take a good look" and "The ruins of the world's economic center"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A bakery distributes bread to protesters

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Venezuelan journalists said that no one called for a nationwide strike, but today the Venezuelan people spontaneously went on strike and boycotted classes in an effort to remove the dictator Maduro.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Shanghai Bus Route 455 and Bus Route 817 were merged. Many citizens believed that there would be a risk of traffic jams after the two routes were merged, and some dissatisfied citizens posted leaflets along the streets to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is the morning of July 30th, Venezuela time, and the Venezuelan people are taking to the streets again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 30, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded to some countries' doubts about the accuracy of Venezuela's election results and the current protests in Venezuela, saying that all parties should respect the choice made by the Venezuelan people. 
In response, many netizens said: The Venezuelan people will win!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, according to videos shot by Hong Kong residents and tourists, rows of shops along the streets in some areas have closed or transferred, showing a state of depression. A local resident said, "The catering industry is the hardest hit, and there are many traditional old shops among them." In response, netizens replied, "Taiwanese people should take a good look" and "The ruins of the world's economic center"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 29-30, Guangdong. The Jinding Baoli factory relocated, the boss was unwilling to compensate, and the workers put up banners on the roof to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 29, Zaozhuang, Shandong. Construction of Evergrande Royal Mansion was suspended, and owners shouted in unison outside the local government, "We want to see the mayor! We want to see the mayor!" Some owners were taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Venezuelan Defense Minister Padrino Lopez said the nationwide protests were a "coup orchestrated by the right wing and imperialism."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Freddy Superano, former vice president of Venezuela's National Assembly and leader of the opposition Popular Volunteer Organization, has been kidnapped

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lao Dongyan, a law professor at Tsinghua University, believes that the online certificate and online number are similar to the health code, and the governance ideas are exactly the same, except that the application of the health code is normalized and used for the governance of a normal society.
The online certificate and online number can be said to be an upgraded version of the health code, which expands the criminal investigation measures originally aimed at suspected criminals to all ordinary individuals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Presidential candidate and opposition leader Edmundo González calls on the military to stop suppressing protests and respect the will of the Venezuelan people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Mainstream social media apps including INS, FB, and Twitter no longer recognize Maduro as the President of Venezuela and have removed his government verification logo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Military vehicles appear in large numbers on the streets of Caracas
